segments.text: Good morning , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am leaving at 10 , so I'd like to settle my account now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . May I have your room number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My room number is 1010 and the name is Ted Black .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , just wait a minute . I will get your bill ready for you right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you used your mini-bar since breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good sir . Here is your bill . Please check and sign it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Excuse me , what's this charge for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's for the breakfast you ordered from the service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . It's on Wednesday morning . Sorry about that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all right . Well , it's all together $ 260 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Have a nice trip .
segments.speaker: S1
